Automata.NFADFA

Class CFA

  • java.lang.Object
    • Automata.NFADFA.CFA
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CDFA, CNFA

    public abstract class CFA
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is used to provide methods for building finite automata.
